about_me.des: I am a Python engineer with website development, automation Ops and writing scripts experience. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful. I can make lots of friends when I coding and travel.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It's pretty minimal, but leverages large type and drastic contrast to make a statement, on all devices.
projects.raspberry: I use Raspberry Pi to realize Smart Home, it can be a home NAS, a web server, a auto downloader, it can report the weather and can monitor the home.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
